## slu proxy smtp

SMTP Proxy

```
slu proxy smtp [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for smtp
  -l, --local string    Local address (eg. :1025)
  -r, --remote string   Remote address (eg. smtp.com:25)
```
